Smart Umbrella: A high-tech umbrella that can track the weather and automatically open or close depending on the conditions. It could also have a built-in speaker to provide weather updates and news, and a Bluetooth connection to allow users to take hands-free calls.

Glow-in-the-Dark Umbrella: An umbrella with a special coating that absorbs light and emits a soft, glowing light in the dark. This would be perfect for those who often find themselves walking in the rain late at night or in low-light areas.

Compact Umbrella: A compact umbrella that can be easily stored in a purse or backpack, making it perfect for city dwellers who need to carry their umbrella around with them all the time. It could also have a built-in windproof mechanism to ensure that the umbrella remains stable in windy conditions.

Customizable Umbrella: An umbrella that allows users to customize the color, design, and even the material of the umbrella. This would be perfect for those who want to add a personal touch to their umbrella or for businesses looking to create unique promotional items.

Umbrella with Built-in Power Bank: An umbrella with a built-in power bank that can charge a user's phone or other devices on the go. This would be especially useful for those who often find themselves in rainy situations and need to keep their devices charged.
